summary:
The X10- Sword
Is my first ever mod..
but I will update it later on (like change the mesh and textures).
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]The X10- Sword [/size][/b]
[size=3]This is my second mod. (I'm still learning - so it will take some time) [/size]
[size=3]but I will update it later on (like change the mesh and textures). [/size]

[size=3][i]This is a standalone mod (no other mods needs to use this mod) [/i][/size]

[size=4]If you want to see the stats - then you have to find it out by yourself by trying this mod out.
To get the sword. Just type: "help sword" then look for "the x10 sword"
after that type in "player.additem (X)" .. there you go
[i]

Picture:" http://poopbear.deviantart.com/art/Bacon-is-Awesome-mark-2-125171731 " 
[/i][/size]
author: Dollar99Man
